item.title: 苹果和腾讯试图规范微信经济
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，李佩和 Vlad Savov 将深入探讨腾讯在苹果为移动应用开发者提供的新项目中扮演的角色。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Pei Li and Vlad Savov delve into Tencent’s role in the new program Apple is offering mobile app developers.】

item.title: 航空航天初创公司 Ursa Major 获得新融资，估值达 6 亿美元
item.description: 航空航天和国防技术初创公司Ursa Major Technologies Inc.在新一轮融资中获得了6亿美元的估值，这是投资者热衷于支持开发新型火箭技术的公司的最新迹象。【原文：Aerospace and defense tech startup Ursa Major Technologies Inc. landed a $600 million valuation in a new funding round, the latest sign that investors are eager to back companies developing new rocket technology.】

item.title: 汇丰银行调查显示：贸易不确定性迫使企业适应更高的成本
item.description: 新民意调查发现，约三分之二的公司预计未来六个月成本将增加【原文：About two-thirds of companies expect their costs to increase over the next six months, the new poll found】

item.title: 股票交易员借助人工智能热潮创造 2005 年以来最佳业绩
item.description: 在近几个月客户纷纷涌入蓬勃发展的人工智能股票之后，整个华尔街的股票交易员将迎来至少二十年来收入最好的一年。【原文：Stock traders across Wall Street are set to turn in their best year for revenue in at least two decades after clients piled into booming AI stocks in recent months.】

item.title: 智利第三季度经济因采矿活动减少而萎缩
item.description: 智利的经济在第三季度出现萎缩，原因是一场致命的矿难阻碍了智利的经济活动，并削弱了拉美最富裕国家之一稳固的国内需求所带来的影响。【原文：Chile’s economy shrank in the third quarter as a deadly mine accident hobbled activity and blunted the effect of solid domestic demand in one of Latin America’s richest nations.】

item.title: 美国银行调查显示现金持有量下降，股票面临卖出信号
item.description: 在美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）的月度调查中，投资者的现金头寸降至临界点以下，在人们对高昂的技术估值疑虑重重之际，触发了所谓的股票卖出信号。【原文：Investors’ cash positions dropped below a critical threshold in a monthly Bank of America Corp. survey, triggering a so-called sell signal for equities at a time of rising doubts around lofty technology valuations.】

item.title: 小米预计 2026 年手机价格将因内存芯片短缺而上涨
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）预计明年内存芯片的短缺将推高移动设备的价格，并与越来越多的公司一道警告说，2026 年这种关键部件的供应可能会出现短缺。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. expects a shortfall in memory chips to push up mobile device prices next year, joining a growing number of companies in warning of a potential supply crunch of the critical component in 2026.】

item.title: 比特币和几乎所有其他东西看起来都有风险
item.description:
在英伟达发布财报之前，华尔街的风险偏好已经消失。【原文：

Wall Street’s risk appetite has disappeared before Nvidia earnings.

】

item.title: 南非戈东瓦纳表示不担心信用评级
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）说，南非最近的信用评级上调是一个意外收获，但他并不专注于赢得进一步的上调评估。【原文：South African Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana said the nation’s recent credit-rating upgrade was a bonus, but he wasn’t focused on winning further upward assessments.】

item.title: Absa 首席执行官寻求交易，希望在非洲扩大业务范围
item.description: Absa Group Ltd. 正在南非以外地区寻求交易，这是该银行在非洲大陆建立地区业务并提高竞争力的新战略的一部分。【原文：Absa Group Ltd. is on the lookout for deals outside South Africa as part of a new strategy to build its regional footprint and boost the bank’s competitiveness on the continent.】

item.title: 乌克兰无人机制造商 SkyFall 在迪拜航展上展示拦截机
item.description: SkyFall 是乌克兰军用 Shrike FPV 无人机的制造商，它在迪拜航展上首次在国外展示了自己的新型拦截机。【原文：SkyFall, the maker of Ukraine’s military Shrike FPV drone, showed its new interceptor for the first time outside its home country at the Dubai Airshow.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪引领南美富国电动汽车热潮，该国天然气价格仅为 7 美元
item.description:
得益于免税政策和加油站的加油成本，电池动力汽车约占乌拉圭新车和 SUV 销售总量的四分之一。【原文：

Battery-powered vehicles make up about a quarter of all new car and SUV sales in Uruguay, thanks to tax exemptions and the cost of filling up at the pump. 

】

item.title: 就业数据公布前焦虑加剧，国债和波动率上升
item.description: 由于交易员在周二 ADP Research 的就业数据公布前加大了对美联储进一步降息的押注，国债有望实现本月首次连续上涨。【原文：Treasuries are on course for their first back-to-back gains of the month as traders boost bets on more Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts ahead of jobs numbers from ADP Research on Tuesday.】

item.title: 微软和亚马逊评级下调，Redburn与同行排名不分伯仲
item.description: 一位下调了华尔街最看好的两家科技巨头评级的分析师表示，生成式人工智能的 "牛市 "行情已不再明朗，应谨慎对待超级计算机。【原文：The bull case for generative artificial intelligence is no longer clear and hyperscalers should be approached with caution, according to an analyst who downgraded two of Wall Street’s most-favored tech giants.】

item.title: 中国消费回暖，特姆普销售额增长 9
item.description: PDD控股公司的收入增长了9%，好于预期，这表明其中国业务正在逐步复苏，而国际Temu业务在美国政策干扰后也趋于稳定。【原文：PDD Holdings Inc.’s revenue rose a better-than-expected 9% in a sign of a gradual recovery in its Chinese business, while the international Temu arm stabilizes after US policy disruptions.】

item.title: 股市 "时日无多"，年底反弹离不开科技股
item.description: 华尔街又经历了残酷的一天，这让人怀疑美国股市是否能在通常一年中最强劲的时期之一取得好成绩。【原文：Another brutal day on Wall Street has called into question whether US stocks can deliver during what is normally one of the strongest times of year.】

item.title: 顶级银行家称非洲为借款支付了 "可耻 "的溢价
item.description: 据非洲大陆的三位顶级银行家称，大多数非洲国家的信用等级远低于世界其他地方的同类主权国家，这使它们在偿还债务方面付出了数十亿美元的额外代价，并影响了至关重要的经济增长。【原文：The credit ratings of most African nations are much lower than similar sovereigns elsewhere in the world, costing them billions of dollars in additional debt-service payments and denting vital economic growth, according to three of the continent’s top bankers.】

item.title: 亚马逊的 AWS 和微软的 Azure 面临欧盟对云技术的调查
item.description: 亚马逊网络服务公司（Amazon Web Services）和微软公司（Microsoft Corp.【原文：Amazon Web Services and Microsoft Corp.’s Azure are under investigation by the European Union to determine whether the world’s two biggest cloud platforms should be hit by rules designed to curtail Big Tech’s market power.】

item.title: 沙特的石油财富正在向人工智能转移。现在，MBS 需要特朗普的祝福
item.description: 塔里克-阿明（Tareq Amin）的销售策略几乎打开了硅谷的每一扇门：如果您正在寻找人工智能计算能力，那就来沙特阿拉伯吧。【原文：Tareq Amin has a sales pitch that’s opened virtually every door in Silicon Valley: If you’re looking for AI computing power, come to Saudi Arabia.】

item.title: 据说 Manner Coffee 在小摊起家 10 年后寻求上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国的漫咖啡正在考虑最快于明年在香港进行首次公开募股，这使该公司于2021年首次出现的上市预期再次升温。【原文：China’s Manner Coffee is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong as soon as next year, according to people with knowledge of the matter, reviving expectations of a listing that first emerged in 2021.】

item.title: 协议临近，印度寻求 "公平、公正 "的美国贸易协议
item.description: 印度贸易部长表示，印度将继续致力于与美国达成一项 "公平、公正和平衡 "的贸易协议，一天前，印度贸易部宣布有望很快达成最终协议。【原文：India remains committed to reaching a “fair, equitable and balanced” trade deal with the US, the country’s trade minister said, a day after his ministry announced that a final agreement is expected soon.】

item.title: 非洲 Pepkor 计划与 Investec 合作提供零收费银行服务
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，非洲最大的服装和手机销售商计划在南非开设银行分行，提供零收费服务，利用其在南非的 6000 家门店网络向数百万低收入客户提供服务。【原文：Africa’s biggest seller of clothing and mobile phones plans to open bank branches in South Africa that offer zero-fee services, using its 6,000 store network in the country to reach millions of lower-income customers, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: Compass 和 Zillow 将私人房源纠纷推上纽约法庭
item.description: 美国住宅房地产市场的两大巨头 Compass 公司和 Zillow 公司将于本周在纽约的一个法庭上对决，这场法律大战可能会重塑美国未来的房屋营销和销售方式。【原文：Two heavyweights in the US residential real estate market, Compass Inc. and Zillow Inc., will face off in a New York courtroom this week in a legal battle that could reshape the future of how homes are marketed and sold in the country.】

item.title: 莱茵金属的目标是在 2030 年实现年销售额 500 亿欧元
item.description: 莱茵金属股份公司（Rheinmetall AG）首席执行官 Armin Papperger 在周二的资本市场日电话会议上告诉分析师，公司的目标是到 2030 年实现年销售额约 500 亿欧元。【原文：Rheinmetall AG is aiming for annual sales of about €50 billion by 2030, Chief Executive Officer Armin Papperger told analysts in a capital markets day call on Tuesday.】

item.title: 爱尔兰多诺霍将离开政府前往世界银行工作
item.description: 帕斯卡尔-多诺霍（Paschal Donohoe）即将卸任爱尔兰财政部长一职，转而担任世界银行常务副行长。【原文：Paschal Donohoe is set to step down as Ireland’s finance minister to become the managing director at the World Bank.】

item.title: 摩根大通平托警告人工智能估值可能出现 "修正
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.副董事长丹尼尔-平托（Daniel Pinto）认为，蓬勃发展的人工智能产业的估值应该重新评估了。【原文：Valuations in the booming AI industry are due for a reassessment, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co. Vice Chairman Daniel Pinto, who warned that any decline would reverberate across the stock market.】

item.title: 特朗普在穆罕默德-苏丹广播公司（MBS）访问沙特前批准为沙特提供 F-35 战斗机
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在周二访问白宫之前表示，美国将向沙特阿拉伯出售 F-35 战斗机，向王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼（Mohammed bin Salman）提供他珍视已久的战利品。【原文：President Donald Trump said the US would sell F-35 fighter jets to Saudi Arabia, offering Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman a prize he’s long cherished, ahead of a visit to the White House on Tuesday.】

item.title: 小米电动汽车部门首次盈利，雄心大增
item.description: 小米公司首次公布了其电动汽车业务的季度利润，这是这家智能手机制造商雄心勃勃地进军拥挤的电动汽车市场的一个重要里程碑。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. reported quarterly profit from its electric vehicle business for the first time, a major milestone for the smartphone maker’s ambitious foray into the crowded market.】

item.title: 南非顶级投资者认为新兴市场时髦，现金不利
item.description: 南非的顶级基金经理们表示，鉴于全球利率的下行趋势，现金并不适合作为资金的存放地，投资者应该从新兴市场中寻找机会。【原文：South Africa’s top money managers say cash is a bad place to station money given the downward trajectory in global interest rates and that investors should look to emerging markets for opportunities.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利认为印度股市在政策推动下跑赢同行
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）认为，在政府政策行动的推动下，印度股市明年将扭转在新兴市场中表现不佳的历史性局面。【原文：Indian equities are set to reverse their historic underperformance against emerging market peers next year, powered by government policy actions, according to Morgan Stanley.】
